instruction: Compare technology from the 1990's to the present day.
output: Technology has changed significantly over the last few decades. In the 1990's, cell phones were large and cumbersome and could only be used to make calls. Now, we have powerful smartphones that can be used for a multitude of purposes, from streaming movies and keeping in touch with family and friends to controlling our homes and even our health. The computing power of devices has also seen huge advances, with most devices now featuring lightning-fast processors and more memory than ever before.
